transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Ji sir Anurag baat kar raha tha Indiamart.com se.

Customer: Bataiye bataiye.

Executive: Aapne call kiya tha na sir uske liye ticket yaha banda tha isliye maine connect kiya bataiye sir kuch issue face kar rahe the.

Customer: Kya cheez bol rahe hain? Kya cheez bol rahe hain? Aapne aapne call kiya tha na Nidhi ko?

Executive: Nidhi aapke account mein.

Customer: Haan haan haan.

Executive: Haan ji to uske baad mere ko kya tha mere ko na jaise payment kya hai log na payment dene mein na mane dikkat kar rahe hain payment dene ke liye na dikkat ho rahi hai.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Kya hai apan koi bhi order ko bina advance ke bhej nahi sakte.

Executive: Haan.

Customer: Bhai main kisi ko maal bhejunga man lijiye India mart ke mein grahak inquiry aa raha hai puch rahe hain rate bhi jam ja raha hai har cheez jam ja raha hai sale out nahi ho pa raha hai usme.

Customer: To aisa kuch mere ko na koi

Customer: Mere ko koi koi aisa system chahiye jisme cash on delivery ho jaye.

Executive: Main aisa system yaha nahi hai Indiamart par.

Customer: Nahi kahin koi package hota hoga alag se lena pade bhale hi wo usko manage kar le.

Executive: Nahi COD ka to aisa kuch bhi nahi hota wo aapko apne level par dekhna padta hai sir.

Customer: To aap log madad karenge tabhi to chalega.

Executive: Nahi usme ya to aapko ye alag se website banwani padti hai COD ki.

Customer: Achcha website banwana padta hai kya kahan se banega wo?

Executive: Website alag se hi banegi kyuki Indiamart se bhi banegi to Indiamart bhi aapko wo buyer wali website hi deta banakar wo B to B website banata hai hamesha ye to aap alag se karwa sakte ho aap apni.

Customer: Nahi to Indiamart bana ke de de na kya dikkat hai no problem.

Executive: Indiamart bana ke de dega but wo COD wali facility usme nahi aa payegi payment ka option usme nahi aa payega.

Customer: To wahi to option chahiye tha apne ko dikkat ho rahi hai nahi to.

Executive: Nahi nahi wo wo usme madad kariye na isme kuch.

Executive: Sir ye cheez jo aap bata rahe hain na COD payment mode ye aapko apne level par dekhna padta hai.

Customer: Nahi to kuch aap rasta batayenge tab to jaise suniye na suniye na jaise aapka business app hai ye aap aapke isme hum log subscription liye hain waise kuch usme bhi kuch subscription ho jaye to bhi chalega.

Executive: Sir aisa koi payment module hai nahi aap ek kaam kar sakte ho jaise koi bhi buyer hai na aap usse kar sakte ho ki bhai dekho humne aapka product tayar kar diya hai video usko dikha do usse advance le lo matlab advance usse 20% aap advance le lo ki bhai aap 20% advance de do main courier se lekar jab main aapko bhej dunga to aap mujhe baki paisa de dena is tarike se usse baat karke wo close kar sakte ho aap maximum seller hamare yaha aise hi karte hain.

Customer: Achcha achcha.

Executive: Theek hai mana koi bhi customize order hai theek hai aapne pehle usko order tayar kar diya usko video bhej diya ki sir aapka order tayar hai aap 20% amount de do theek hai to main isko courier karwa deta hu main courier list dunga aapko whatsapp karunga taki aap track kar pao to us time mujhe baki ka payment karwa dena.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: 50% 60% hai na aur baki chahe delivery se karwa dena aap is tarike se aap wo baat karke wo kar sakte ho aur baki COD wali facility chahiye na aapko to wo aap apni nearby courier service se pata kar lo.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Jo courier honge na nearby DTC DTC DC hoga.

Customer: Nahi to nearby se nahi hoga na jaise kya hai main to Chhattisgarh mein rehta hu ab mere ko man lijiye mere ko Tripura Assam mein maal bhejna hai Arunachal Pradesh mein maal bhejna hai.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: To waha mera aap DTC courier jao aap DTC courier jao ya koi bhi courier hai aapke aas paas na aap usse baat karo wo log aapko de denge usme COD facility.

Customer: Achcha.

Executive: Kyuki courier walon pe hi depend karta hai.

Customer: Achcha achcha achcha.

Executive: Theek hai aur koi tarika bataiye na kuch aur koi tarika bataiye.

Executive: Sir isme aur koi tarika aur aap baki tarika hai ki agar koi bharosa matlab bharose wali baat hai ki bhai kisi ko bharosa nahi ho raha aapke paas to aapki apni website aap promote kara sakte ho website rehti hai to ek genuine wo rehta hai ki bhai theek hai.

Customer: To website jaise ye aap logon ke taraf se to bana ke dete honge website.

Executive: Haan website bana ke de dete hain Indiamart bana deta hai jaise aapki aapki industry mein agar aap jante ho to ye pro audio agar aapka jo product hai pro audio mein to main bata deta hu protech ek JDS enterprises hai JDS enterprises near Delhi se hai.

Customer: Ji ji ji.

Executive: Theek hai to unki bhi apni apni website hai.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Theek hai to wo website pe wo easily ek bar trust ho pata hai ki bhi company apni website chala rahi hai to ek genuine listed company hai apni matlab apna domain run kar rahi hai.

Customer: To kahan se aap log bana dijiye na aap log aap log banwa dijiye na.

Executive: Sir uska services ka charge wo alag rehta hai wo isse upar wali service mein aati hai website website ki agar website ki agar baat karu wo jo ek saal ki costing hai uski 70000 plus GST padti hai usme bhi benefit tha ki do saal mein teen saal ka services mil raha hai matlab 140000 plus GST mein wo aapko teen saal ki mil jati hai.

Customer: Achcha achcha.

Executive: Usme ye rahega ki jo bhi amount aapne jaise isme adjust hua hai to total amount aapko kya bole website ka kya bole website ka kya bole?

Executive: Website ka 140000 teen saal ke liye 140000 website ka khali ha website ka services matlab aapki by lead aur inquiry bhi badh jati hai isse upar ki level ki service aati hai wo website jo trust seal aapki chal rahi hai na jo aapki chal rahi hai isse upar level ki website wali hi services hai Indiamart ki theek hai usme aapko trust seal liye complimentry mil jata jo bhi aapne to ab ye jo teen saal ka aapne paisa amount diya hai wo teen saal ka paisa usme se less ho jayega mano jaise 140000 plus GST ka amount ban raha hai theek hai 140000 plus GST amount banta hai ye aapka jata hai 165 aap isme se aapka jo total amount minus ho jayega jo aapne pay kiya hai theek hai jaise 67660 ek bar ek bar diya tha aapne aur 68740 ek bar diya tha to ye less ho jayega to keval jo ab aapka aayega wo aayega aapko 51000 plus GST.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Teen teen saal ki website ho jayegi isme aapki.

Customer: Achcha achcha achcha.

Executive: Aisa rahega.

Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.

Executive: Teen saal mein usme aapki website ho jayegi apne jitna djshowroom.com.in.net jo bhi domain aap chahte ho wo aapko milega.

Customer: Ji.

Customer: Achcha achcha achcha.

Executive: Jaise aapke competition mein chal rahe hain na us tarike se jaise matlab kisi company ki website aap dekhte ho jaise samsung ki aapne kholi samsung ki puri website aati hai samsung.com theek hai us tarike se aapki website aaya karegi waha par.

Customer: Haan haan.

Customer: Achcha achcha.

Customer: Chaliye theek hai na main dekhta hu.

Executive: Aap isko dekh lijiye jaise bhi aapko lagta hai to mujhe bata dijiye theek hai yaha par ticket open ho gaya tha to main usko close kar raha hu sir koi bhi information chahiye aap mujhe directly call kar liya isko theek hai aapke paas ek feedback aayega usko satisfy se reply kar dijiye please.

Customer: Ji ji ji theek hai na theek hai ok.

Executive: Ji ji theek hai.

Executive: Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Difficulty in receiving payments from customers.

- Wants cash on delivery option for sales.

- Inquires about website creation through IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Explained no COD option available with IndiaMART.

- Suggested taking advance payments from buyers.

- Advised contacting nearby courier services for COD.

- Informed about website creation services with costs.

- Explained how existing amount can be adjusted.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will review the website creation option.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- cod, payment, website, subscription, buyleads
